Nightlight:

Nightlight smiled and waited for the process to start.

From: =
Sandy Panico 
Sent: Friday, July 29, 2011 12:41 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
Subject: Re: MEdic Bay




Nightshift blinks his headlights in response=
 to Nighlights reply.

" I promise, the training takes a while but once ya =
go through it, it'll stick with ya for ages.  You'll be able ta defend your=
self no matter if ya got energy weapons or not.  Your body,mind and spark b=
ecome your most powerful defense.  You'll see when I do a few demo rounds w=
ith you guys." 

He chuckles quietly.

" let's hope Rodimus joins in and pa=
ys attention this time."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On=
 Jul 29, 2011, at 12:39 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wro=
te:


    
  Nighlight:

  =E2=80=9CI could shoot energy balls from my hand=
s... Just that=E2=80=9Dwhispered the femme and she added=E2=80=9CI was capt=
ured by predacons two times, couting the last one and reprogramed. In the f=
irst one I was involved in the defence of the base... I wasnt the most skil=
led cause I was captured again while I was defending it. =E2=80=9Dthen she =
added =E2=80=9CLet=E2=80=99s do this...=E2=80=9D




  From: Sandy Panico 
=
  Sent: Thursday, July 28, 2011 8:24 AM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sub=
ject: Re: MEdic Bay




  Nightshift listens thoughtfully.  Being a Pretend=
er himself, he too was vexed between factions as he would often have to fig=
ht against his own faction when in the company of Decepticon forces.  He co=
uld feel her pain and flashes his parking lights in response.  

  " I sure=
 know where you're comm'n from.  Way back when, when the cons didn't know m=
y true faction, I'd have ta take out my bot buddies when I was supposedly i=
n the company of Decepticon forces, just so that I didn't get suspected of =
treason.  Slag was that a nail in my tires.  I hated every minute of  those=
 battles.  And what was worse, the times when the cons won their battles be=
cause of someth'n I did.  That hurt more than anything else.  Still does, b=
ecause sooner or later I'm gonna have ta do it all over again.  I really do=
n't wanna do that but, if we're gonna get the edge on the cons, it may be u=
p ta me ta put on the pretender routine again.  But this time I'm gonna hav=
e ta make it look real.  And it might involve me tak'n out one of our own i=
n order ta get back the trust of the cons.  I really don't wanna go that ro=
ute and I hope none of the bosses asks me ta do that.  I dunno if Tucson wo=
uld ask but I got a funny feel'n that Leo or Rodimus might.  I hope it does=
n't turn out that way but I cant do anything about that."


  He sighs.


 =
 " If there was a way ta get rid of my Decepticon badge, I'd have it remove=
d in a spark beat."   

  Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

  =
On Jul 28, 2011, at 1:35 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wr=
ote:


      
    Nightlight:

    Nightlight said while she looked at the =
two males "I need the tools to keep 
    safe my family, but I dont know wi=
ch ones I need... I never has been a 
    warrior..." then she remembered h=
er bitter experience as BlackStorm and with 
    a bitter tone said "not as=
 Maximal..."

    Elita nodded, she knew that her mom was reprogramed as Pr=
ed once, but she 
    was much better as Maximal

    -----Mensaje original=
----- 
    From: Sandy
    Sent: Wednesday, July 27, 2011 8:53 AM
    To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com
    Subject: Re: MEdic Bay

    Nightshift looks over=
 to Nightlight, seeing an opportunity to try his skills 
    at teaching th=
e art of the Ninjabot to Nightlight, which would enhance her 
    skill lev=
el considerably. It was all about speed, precision, balance, 
    disciplin=
e, grace, and of course effectiveness.

    He could see potential in her a=
nd turns his head in both Nightlight and 
    Bumps direction.

    " Bump'=
s right, that's somethn' ya gotta learn, but I see a lotta potential 
    f=
or train'n ya as a Ninjabot. You got the right moves, mody, and grace, and =

    once you're trained, there's gonna be no stopp'n you Nightlight. Maste=
r 
    Yokitron once said, that a student often shows potential even if the=
y don't 
    realize it themselves. Now, that's totally up to you if ya wan=
t the 
    training, just see me after we get repaired, and I'll set up a t=
raining 
    program for ya. Hmm, maybe Rodimus might wanna join in on it t=
oo.. It's a 
    perfect opportunity for both of you ta get some extra trai=
ning under your 
    belts."

    He positions himself again.

    " It wou=
ld really help both of you out a lot, see'n what Hydras managed ta 
    pul=
l on ya in the past. The reason why it didn't work on Tucson or me, is 
   =
 that Master Yokitron's training sorta prepared us spiritually for what cou=
ld 
    come down the pike. Clear minds empty of thoughts are less likely t=
a get 
    infected by negative influences, simply because there's no thoug=
ht energy ta 
    hold onto. Clear mind, clear soul, clear spark. Bad stuff=
 just goes in one 
    way, and out the other. You guys had a lot on your m=
inds when Hydras took 
    you. And that couldn't be helped, but now it can=
 be. I bet my spark plugs 
    that if you and Rodimus train with me, I can=
 get both of ya up ta our level 
    and that'll make you a pair of the str=
ongest Autobots this side of the 
    galaxy, but not the type of strength =
most warriors perceive. This type of 
    strength is the strength of spiri=
t, inner peace, and harmony. A perfect 
    balance between spark, soul, an=
d mind. And yeah, there's a lotta dexterity 
    aquired in Ninjabot traini=
ng, the type of dexterity that makes even Tucson 
    Prime a bit different=
 then the traditional Autobot Commander. It's a 
    difference Hydras has =
no inclination how ta fend off. THAT'S the direction 
    Tucson is gonna t=
ake, and if you guys were trained in our art, so more power 
    to ya."

 =
   He then looks to Bump, as the repair bench does its job to repair the 
 =
   internal damages done to him.

    " Speakn' of performance, that remind=
s me... I need new hydraulic shock 
    absorbers, timing belt, and I know =
my struts need work, new tires, body 
    work, and Ty Rods fixed. Oh yeah,=
 need a new front and back end alignment 
    too."

    To repair the damg=
ages to his alt form, he now transforms into his vehicle 
    mode, to prep=
are for the rest of his repairs. He also notices a busted 
    headlight on=
 the left side.

    "Scrap, throw in a new headlight for the left side, ne=
w bumpers, front, 
    back, side, and awww slag, transmission's actn' up. =
Probably because I 
    smacked that tree real hard in alt form. After this=
 is all done, I am so 
    gonna give those preds the bill, literally. In o=
ther words, I need a total 
    overhaul ta my alt form. And if you can hel=
p it, I'd like ta hold onta this 
    one for a while."

    --- In nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
    >
    > > <O=
LD>
    > >
    > > Nightlight Stood up And leave her daughter in the bed, =
she smiled and 
    > > said
    > > to her daughter "I be righ back in no =
time, just remain here"
    > >
    > > "Yes Mommie"said happily Elita
    =
> >
    > > Nightlight smiled and she walked toward the interior of the cr,=
 she 
    > > looked
    > > to Bump and said "I'm ready, could you add any=
 defensive skills that I 
    > > may
    > > need?? please"
    >
    > <N=
EW>
    >
    > BUMP looked at NIGHTLIGHT quizzically, "What do you mean?" =
He
    > manipulated a few controls on his screen. "If you are looking for =
a
    > specific ability, I can see what I can do, but as far as skills, th=
at
    > is something you learn. I can't make you a sharp shooter or a lock=

    > pick. I can only give you the tools you need to make that happen. Yo=
u
    > will have to practice to get good at it."
    >
    > (TAG)
    >
 =
   > Preston
    >

oups Links
